citation.case_name: Metropolitan Government of Nashville and Davidson County v. Deja Vu of Nashville, Inc.

html:
535 U.S. 1073

METROPOLITAN GOVERNMENT OF NASHVILLE AND DAVIDSON COUNTY ET AL.
v.
DEJA VU OF NASHVILLE, INC., ET AL.

No. 01-1324.

Supreme Court of the United States.

May 13, 2002.

1

C. A. 6th Cir. Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 274 F. 3d 377.
